entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
